bDisplayInActionBar: True to generally display this widget's actions in the action bar, assuming it has actions.
bConsumePointerInput: Set this to true if you don't want any pointer (mouse and touch) input to bubble past this widget

methods.name: RegisterScrollRecipientExternal
methods.doc: Add a widget to the list of widgets to get scroll events for this input root node

methods.name: SetConsumePointerInput
methods.doc: Sets whether or not this widget will consume ALL pointer input that reaches it

methods.name: UnregisterScrollRecipientExternal
methods.doc: Remove a widget from the list of widgets to get scroll events for this input root node
